hero.title: Roadside Assistance
hero.subtitle: Anytime, Anywhere
hero.description: With Rana Jayen, roadside assistance is always within reach. Whether you need towing, quick on-site repairs, battery charging, or emergency help, our platform connects you instantly with the nearest trusted service provider. Fast, reliable, and available anytime, anywhere, so you can get back on the road with confidence.

whyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE US
whyChooseUs.subtitle: People choose us because we serve the best for everyone

discover.title: Discover our app

discover.description: Discover the features of the Rana Jayen app — find nearby providers, request help instantly, track responses, and manage your service history with ease.

contact.description: Get in touch with us for any questions or assistance you might need.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our services.

services.question: What services does Rana Jayeen offer?
services.answer: We provide emergency roadside assistance, including towing, quick on-site repairs, battery charging, fuel delivery, and more. Our platform connects you instantly with the nearest trusted service provider.

requestHelp.question: How can I request emergency help?
requestHelp.answer: You can request help directly through our website or mobile app. Just enable location access and select the type of service you need. Our system will automatically connect you with the nearest available service provider.

availability.question: Is Rana Jayeen available 24/7?
availability.answer: Yes, we operate around the clock — 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year — to ensure you're never stranded on the road.

becomeProvider.question: How do I become a service provider?
becomeProvider.answer: Simply sign up on our platform and complete the partner verification process. We'll verify your credentials, insurance, and background. Once approved, you'll receive service requests in your area.

pricing.question: How much do your services cost?
pricing.answer: Our pricing is competitive and transparent. Costs vary based on the type of service needed and location. You'll see the exact price before confirming your request.

responseTime.question: How quickly can you respond to requests?
responseTime.answer: Our average response time is 15-30 minutes depending on your location and traffic conditions. We prioritize emergency situations and work to get help to you as quickly as possible.

newsletter.placeholder: Enter your email to get the latest news...

about.subtitle: Why Choose Us
about.title: Reliable Roadside Assistance When You Need It Most
about.description: We provide fast, reliable, and professional roadside assistance across the region. From towing to fuel delivery, our certified experts are always ready to help.

speed.name: Fast Response
speed.description: Get help within minutes, not hours. Our network of professionals ensures quick response times across the region.

safety.name: Verified Professionals
safety.description: All our service providers are background-checked, licensed, and insured for your peace of mind.

coverage.name: 24/7 Coverage
coverage.description: Available around the clock, 365 days a year. Help is always just a call or tap away.

team.name: Expert Team
team.description: Our certified technicians have years of experience handling all types of vehicle emergencies.
